about_the_game:
Step into the explosive world of "ReactFuse" a thrilling FPS game that challenges players to wield two weapons simultaneously, each with its unique enhancements. Unleash your strategic mastery and dominate the battlefield with your customizable loadout and powerful special abilities. Engage in fast-paced matches where every decision counts and every shot can turn the tide of battle.

Elemental Powers
Embrace the Elemental Power weapon enhancement, offering four distinct abilities: Elemental Neutral, Elemental Heal, Elemental Damage, and Elemental Stun. Elemental Neutral creates white spheres that can be charged with other three powers and inflict it's effect in it's raious.

Elemental Chain
Take your tactical skills to the next level by chaining neutral elemntal spheres with power. When Neutral elemntal sphere infused with power it create a area in which other neutral elemntal spheres charges with the same power creating a elemantal chain. Strategically position your charged shots to set up spectacular chain reactions that can alter the course of battles and catch your opponents off guard.
Enhanced Bullets
Charge your weapons to infuse your bullets with elemental power. Watch as your bullets crackle with energy and take on different effects, depending on the element you've chosen. Coordinate with other powers to unleash devastating combos.
Dual-Wield Mastery
Harness the power of dual-wielding as you seamlessly use two weapons during intense firefights and switch between other weapons strategically. Customize your loadout with a wide array of firearms, from rapid-firing SMGs to precision rifles.

Witness the exhilarating gameplay in action as player seamlessly switch between their dual weapons, charge their bullets with elemental energy, and deploy their unique powers to turn the tide of battle. Experience the thrill of chaining power-infused spheres to create explosive combinations that reshape the battlefield. Your destiny awaits on the battlefield of "ReactFuse" Are you ready to wield two weapons, unleash enhanced bullets, and harness elemental powers to dominate the battle?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or greater or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GTX 650 or AMD HD 5850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
